https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/u0zU80umTwuWnF8Io8rG1eohDOj.jpg Debtocracy seeks the causes of the Greek debt crisis and proposes solutions sidelined by the government and the dominant media. It follows countries like Ecuador that created debt Audit Commissions and tracks this process in Greece. Debtocracy
